app_metadata.description: An application for deploying simple containers.
app_metadata.name: ix-app
app_metadata.title: iX App

groups.name: Security Context Configuration
groups.description: Configure Security Context for the container

questions.label: Notes
questions.description:
Notes about the application, this will be shown in the Notes card. </br>
You can use markdown here. This have no effect on the application.

questions.label: Image
questions.description: The image to use for the container.

attrs.label: Repository
attrs.description: The repository of the image.

attrs.label: Tag
attrs.description: The tag of the image.

attrs.label: Pull Policy
attrs.description: The pull policy for the image.

enum.description: Pull the image if it is not already present on the host.
Always pull an image even if it is present on the host.
Never pull an image even if it is not present on the host.

questions.label: Hostname
questions.description: The hostname to use for the container.

questions.label: Entrypoint
questions.description:
Entrypoint to use for the container. </br>
Overrides the default ENTRYPOINT of the image.

questions.label: Command
questions.description:
Command to use for the container. </br>
Overrides the default CMD of the image.

questions.label: Timezone
questions.description: Timezone setting for the container.

questions.label: Environment Variables
questions.description: Configure environment variables.

questions.label: Restart Policy
questions.description: The restart policy to use for the container.

enum.description: No - Does not restart the container under any circumstances.
Unless Stopped - Restarts the container irrespective of the exit code but stops restarting when the service is stopped or removed.
On Failure - Restarts the container if the exit code indicates an error.
Always - Restarts the container until its removal.

questions.label: Maximum Retry Count
questions.description:
Maximum number of retries allowed for a container to exit with a code indicating an error. </br>
Setting this to zero, will keep restarting the container if it exits with a code indicating an error.

questions.label: Disable Builtin Healthcheck
questions.description: Disable the built-in HEALTHCHECK defined in the image.

questions.label: TTY
questions.description:
Allocate a pseudo-TTY.</br>
Note, that due to a bug in the underlying library</br>
using this option will cause the logs to not display properly</br>
on the TrueNAS WebUI.</br>
You can still view logs using 'docker logs ...'.</br>
Bug: https://github.com/docker/docker-py/issues/1394

questions.label: Stdin
questions.description: Keep stdin open on the container.

questions.label: Devices
questions.description:
Devices to use for the container. </br>
Eg: Host Device: /dev/ttyUSB0, Container Device: /dev/ttyACM0

questions.label: Privileged
questions.description: Run the container in privileged mode.

questions.label: Capabilities
questions.description: Add Linux capabilities to the container.

questions.label: Custom User
questions.description: Run the container as a custom user.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that container will run as.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that container will run as.

questions.label: Host Network
questions.description: Bind to the host network.

questions.label: Ports
questions.description: Configure ports for the container.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

questions.label: Custom DNS Setup
questions.description: Configure custom DNS settings for the container.

attrs.label: Nameservers
attrs.description: The DNS nameservers to use.

attrs.label: Search Domains
attrs.description: The DNS search domains to use.

attrs.label: DNS Options
attrs.description: The DNS options to use.

attrs.label: Name
attrs.description: The name of the portal

attrs.label: Protocol
attrs.description: The protocol for the portal

attrs.label: Use Node IP
attrs.description: Use the node IP for the portal

attrs.label: Host
attrs.description: The host for the portal

attrs.label: Port
attrs.description: The port for the portal

attrs.label: Path
attrs.description: The path for the portal

questions.label: Storage
questions.description: Storage for the container.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.</br>
tmpfs: Is a temporary directory that will be created on the RAM.</br>

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)
Tmpfs (Temporary directory created on the RAM)

attrs.label: Read Only
attrs.description: Mount the volume as read only.

attrs.label: Mount Path
attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: SMB Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the SMB dataset.

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: The server to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Path
attrs.description: The path to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: The username to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Domain
attrs.description: The domain to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Tmpfs Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the tmpfs dataset.

attrs.label: Tmpfs Size Limit (in Mi)
attrs.description:
The maximum size (in Mi) of the temporary directory.</br>
For example: 500

attrs.label: Enable Resource Limits
attrs.description: Enable resource limits for the container.

attrs.label: CPUs
attrs.description: CPUs limit for the container.

attrs.label: Memory (in MB)
attrs.description: Memory limit for the container.

1.2.9.readme:
iX App

iX App is designed to let user deploy a docker image in TrueNAS SCALE with a simple wizard.

chart_metadata.description: An application for deploying simple containers.
chart_metadata.name: ix-app
chart_metadata.title: iX App
